sage.networking.server

Class UDPServerSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.DatagramSocket
      • sage.networking.server.UDPServerSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, IServerSocket

    public class UDPServerSocket
extends java.net.DatagramSocket
implements IServerSocket
    A UDP implementation of a IServerSocket. This socket is able to send and receive Serializable objects from server side of a game. An underlying DatagramSocket is used in this implementation.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UDPServerSocket(int localPort, GameConnectionServer server)
      Creates a UDPServerSocket bound to the local port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UDPServerSocket

        public UDPServerSocket(int localPort,
                       GameConnectionServer server)
                throws java.net.SocketException
        Creates a UDPServerSocket bound to the local port. The server passed in is used to process the packets received by this socket. See DatagramSocket.DatagramSocket(int) for information about local binding of socket.
        Parameters:
        localPort - local port to bind socket to
        server - server to process packets
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException
